blessings.name: Sun's Blessing
blessings.description: Light brings life and growth. +12% crop yield, +10% satiety from all food, +3C heat resistance, light sources provide +1C warmth radius.

blessings.name: Bountiful Harvest
blessings.description: Specialize in farming excellence. +15% crop yield, +12% satiety from crops, crops have 15% chance for bonus seeds, +15% chance to find rare crop variants. Agriculture path. Requires Sun's Blessing.

blessings.name: Baker's Touch
blessings.description: Master the art of food preparation. Cooking/baking yields +25% more food, +15% satiety from cooked food, food spoils 20% slower, +5C heat resistance. Food preparation path. Requires Sun's Blessing.

blessings.name: Master Farmer
blessings.description: Achieve ultimate farming mastery. +20% crop yield, +18% satiety from crops, crops have 25% chance for bonus seeds, +30% chance to find rare crop variants, wild crops give +40% yield. Requires Bountiful Harvest.

blessings.name: Divine Kitchen
blessings.description: Create incredibly nutritious meals. Cooking yields +35% more, +25% satiety from cooked food, food spoils 30% slower, +7C heat resistance, meals provide temporary +5% max health buff. Requires Baker's Touch.

blessings.name: Avatar of Abundance
blessings.description: Embody the endless bounty of the harvest. +8% movement speed, +10% max health, never suffer malnutrition penalties, can create blessed meals with powerful buffs. Requires Master Farmer or Divine Kitchen.

blessings.name: Community Farm
blessings.description: Your congregation shares agricultural knowledge. +10% crop yield, +8% satiety from all food for all members.

blessings.name: Harvest Festival
blessings.description: Celebrate abundant harvests together. +15% crop yield, +12% satiety from all food, food spoils 10% slower for all. Requires Community Farm.

blessings.name: Land of Plenty
blessings.description: Your land becomes legendary for its bounty. +22% crop yield, +18% satiety from all food, food spoils 18% slower, +5C heat resistance for all. Requires Harvest Festival.

blessings.name: Pantheon of Light
blessings.description: Your religion becomes the source of endless bounty. +30% crop yield, +20% satiety from all food, food spoils 25% slower, +8C heat resistance, religion can build Sacred Granary for all. Requires Land of Plenty.
